article_title: At least one injury in I-88 crash between semi, motorcycle
article_text:
At least one injury in I-88 crash between semi, motorcycle

hello

All lanes have been reopened after a collision between a semitrailer truck and a motorcycle on westbound I-88 at Route 31 late Sunday morning left at least one person injured, state police said.

District 15 police are investigating and no other information was immediately available. The right and center lanes were closed following the accident.

article_metadata.description: A collision between a semi and a motorcycle on westbound 1-88 at Route 31 late Sunday morning has left at least one person injured and has shut down multiple lanes of traffic, state police said.
article_metadata.author: Daily Herald report
